[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: ShortArray(
            Bracketed {
                left_bracket: Span(
                    3,
                    1,
                ),
                inner: CommaSeparated {
                    inner: [
                        ArrayItem {
                            key: None,
                            value: FunctionCall {
                                target: Identifier(
                                    SimpleIdentifier(
                                        SimpleIdentifier {
                                            span: Span(
                                                3,
                                                2,
                                            ),
                                            value: "foo",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                                arguments: ArgumentList {
                                    comments: CommentGroup {
                                        comments: [],
                                    },
                                    left_parenthesis: Span(
                                        3,
                                        5,
                                    ),
                                    arguments: [],
                                    right_parenthesis: Span(
                                        3,
                                        24,
                                    ),
                                },
                            },
                            unpack: false,
                            by_ref: false,
                        },
                    ],
                    commas: [],
                },
                right_bracket: Span(
                    3,
                    25,
                ),
            },
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                26,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
